title: Mirems
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: mirems
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $626.6K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Mirems. The average
  contract duration was 1.61 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $202.9K. The longest
  contract was 4.92 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.0M.
lookup_name: 'MIREMS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '626.6K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '20'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '10'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '50%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '112%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.7M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.61'
s421_mean_contract_value: '202.9K'
s425_max_duration: '4.92'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.0M'
---
